trans-unit.source: The report will be built dynamically at the top of this window. The Report Wizard is designed to help you create a report step-by-step, but if you wish, you can go back to the manual mode without losing any of the settings.
trans-unit.target: The report will be built dynamically at the top of this window. The Report Wizard is designed to help you create a report step-by-step, but if you wish, you can go back to the manual mode without losing any of the settings.

trans-unit.source: The list report is the most common type of report. This type of report allows you to display different types of data in a list, and provides the ability to sort orders as well as perform computations on them. Several types of presentations can be applied to the report according to your needs. The final report can also be printed or exported in a variety of output formats.
trans-unit.target: The list report is the most common type of report. This type of report allows you to display different types of data in a list, and provides the ability to sort orders as well as perform computations on them. Several types of presentations can be applied to the report according to your needs. The final report can also be printed or exported in a variety of output formats.

trans-unit.source: The cross-tab report is a type of report that displays an analysis of two sets of numeric data. As with the list report, it is possible to perform computations on the values, and to use predefined templates for the presentation. The final report can be printed or exported in a variety of output formats.
trans-unit.target: The cross-tab report is a type of report that displays an analysis of two sets of numeric data. As with the list report, it is possible to perform computations on the values, and to use predefined templates for the presentation. The final report can be printed or exported in a variety of output formats.

trans-unit.source: To select fields for the report, drag-and-drop the items, or select a field from the list on the left and click on the single green arrow to add the field. Each field will be presented as a column in the report.
trans-unit.target: To select fields for the report, drag-and-drop the items, or select a field from the list on the left and click on the single green arrow to add the field. Each field will be presented as a column in the report.

trans-unit.source:
Each field is now a column in the report. Some of these columns may be sorted. To add a sort, drag and drop the items, or select a report column from the list on the left and click on the single green arrow button to add the column.
Each new sort order will create a new subtotal. This subtotal is displayed as new line between the "Detail" and "Grand total" lines.
trans-unit.target:
Each field is now a column in the report. Some of these columns may be sorted. To add a sort, drag and drop the items, or select a report column from the list on the left and click on the single green arrow button to add the column.
Each new sort order will create a new subtotal. This subtotal is displayed as new line between the "Detail" and "Grand total" lines.

trans-unit.source: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, select the cell in the report area to which you want to add the computation, and check the appropriate box for the type of computation. To add a computation for an entire column, select the column by clicking on its header, and then check the appropriate box for the computation you want to add. You can also add computations on lines. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Computations may be added to “Subtotal” or “Grand total” lines.
trans-unit.target: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, select the cell in the report area to which you want to add the computation, and check the appropriate box for the type of computation. To add a computation for an entire column, select the column by clicking on its header, and then check the appropriate box for the computation you want to add. You can also add computations on lines. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Computations may be added to “Subtotal” or “Grand total” lines.

trans-unit.source: You can output a report into several types of formats, depending upon how you ultimately want to use the report. You can select the output type from the choices to the left. Specific parameters will be required according to the type of output selected.
trans-unit.target: You can output a report into several types of formats, depending upon how you ultimately want to use the report. You can select the output type from the choices to the left. Specific parameters will be required according to the type of output selected.

trans-unit.source: For this output type, you will need to enter a column delimiter, a line delimiter, and a destination file name without the extension. The report engine will use the delimiters to build the report as a simple text file.
trans-unit.target: For this output type, you will need to enter a column delimiter, a line delimiter, and a destination file name without the extension. The report engine will use the delimiters to build the report as a simple text file.

trans-unit.source: For this output type, the report engine will use an HTML template to build the report in an HTML file.
trans-unit.target: For this output type, the report engine will use an HTML template to build the report in an HTML file.

trans-unit.source: In order to be complete, the cross-tab report requires three data sources. One data source will define the column values, another data source will define the row values, and the last data source will define the cell values.
trans-unit.target: In order to be complete, the cross-tab report requires three data sources. One data source will define the column values, another data source will define the row values, and the last data source will define the cell values.

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop the field here whose distinct values will define the columns.
trans-unit.target: Drag-and-drop the field here whose distinct values will define the columns.

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop the field here whose distinct values will define the rows.
trans-unit.target: Drag-and-drop the field here whose distinct values will define the rows.

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop the field here that will define the computations for the cells.
trans-unit.target: Drag-and-drop the field here that will define the computations for the cells.

trans-unit.source: Columns and rows can be independently sorted in two directions or not sorted at all. To modify the sort, click on the arrows.
trans-unit.target: Columns and rows can be independently sorted in two directions or not sorted at all. To modify the sort, click on the arrows.

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to select a master table in order to indicate the type of data with which you want to work. The report engine will only use the records selected in this table.
trans-unit.target: It is necessary to select a master table in order to indicate the type of data with which you want to work. The report engine will only use the records selected in this table.

trans-unit.source: The report engine will use the records you selected from the master table. It is possible to modify the data selected from this table with the “New query” button. Using the standard query editor, you can specify a new selection.
trans-unit.target: The report engine will use the records you selected from the master table. It is possible to modify the data selected from this table with the “New query” button. Using the standard query editor, you can specify a new selection.

trans-unit.source: Several templates are available for report presentation. For each template, you can choose which user interface parameters you want to activate. The “Apply” button will apply the selected presentation type to the report in the top area.
trans-unit.target: Several templates are available for report presentation. For each template, you can choose which user interface parameters you want to activate. The “Apply” button will apply the selected presentation type to the report in the top area.

trans-unit.source: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Computations may be added only to the cells.
trans-unit.target: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Computations may be added only to the cells.

trans-unit.source: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Titles can be associated with column totals.
trans-unit.target: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Titles can be associated with column totals.

trans-unit.source: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Titles can be associated with row totals.
trans-unit.target: There are five types of computations available. To add a computation, check the appropriate box for the type of computation you want added. Several computations can be associated with a single cell. Titles can be associated with row totals.

trans-unit.source: For this output type, the report engine will use the standard printer settings dialog before printing.
trans-unit.target: For this output type, the report engine will use the standard printer settings dialog before printing.

trans-unit.source: For this output type, the report engine will generate the report into a 4D View document.
trans-unit.target: For this output type, the report engine will generate the report into a 4D View document.

trans-unit.source: For this output type, the report engine will generate the report into a chart document.
trans-unit.target: For this output type, the report engine will generate the report into a chart document.
